message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $85 for the product?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $87.50.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Could we possibly agree on $86 for the product?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $88.
I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. Could we possibly settle on $87 for the product?
I'm running out of room to negotiate, Bob. I'll make one more offer. I'll sell the product to you for $89.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to propose $88 for the product.
